Html: I love the project and haven't really encountered any major bugs so far.  Good work!  The only problem I have found is when the program is minimized to the taskbar.  If you click one of the popup buttons it will change the page in the actual program but it does not change the preview window.  Is it possible for real time updates in the preview window?
Thanks for the feedback.  It takes a bit of work to override Window's default behavior here, but it's doable.  I'll open an issue to track, but hopefully we can get this fixed in an upcoming release.
